content.rendered:
About Us

About HomeArchs - Top Architects in Noida, Lucknow & Varanasi

Your Partner In Designing The House Of Your Dreams - Top Architects in Noida, Lucknow & Varanasi 

We know building your dream house is a massive moment for you. From the construction to the interior design, you would want everything to be of the finest quality. We, at HomeArchs, genuinely understand your dreams and work towards fulfilling them.

Our efficient team consists of architects, engineers, and designers with extensive experience and artistic creativity. All of us strive to provide innovative and out-of-the-box ideas that you will love implementing in your house.

At HomeArchs, we hold one strong belief close to our hearts: the customer’s satisfaction is our priority. Therefore, you can trust us in this beautiful endeavor of converting a house into your home.

We are a famous bunch of listeners who enjoy listening to your ideas, plans, and suggestions. You can truly customize your interiors to your heart's content with us by your side. Plus, our team is always excited to give our quality insights so you can bring life to your dream house.

Know More Or How It Works

Our Team

Aishwary Singh
(Founder)

He is a Civil Engineer & MBA in Construction Project Management from world renowned institute RICS, U.K. He holds experience of working with various reputed developers in India and in Middle Eastern Counties in multiple domains which brings in with him a profound knowledge of Real Estate Industry.

Shashank Singh
(Co-Founder & COO)

He holds a degree in Civil Engineering and brings in with him hands on expertise in Construction Site Management which he acquired while working with various big brand names in Real Estate industry on multiple High-Rise, Low-Rise & Commercial Building projects.

What We Offer?

We offer a wide range of services, including home construction, interior design, and modular kitchen designing.

Home Construction

  • 1. 360° Camera access of Site.
  • 2. 100+ Quality Checks
    3. 251* Day Delivery
  • 4. 100+ Projects 
  • 5. Up to 10 Years Warranty 

Architectural Services

  • 1. Save Big on Your Construction
  • 2. Very Affordable
    3. Professional Architects & Structural Engineers
  • 4. 3 Days Delivery of Floor Plan.
  •  

Interior Designing

  • 1. 150 + Projects Delivered 
  • 2. 1000+ Designs To Choose From
    3. Very Affordable Prices
  • 4. 45 Days Delivery
  • 5. Aesthetically Pleasing Homes
  •  

Modular Kitchens

  • 1. Get More Space With Our Unique Design 
  • 2. 300+ Kitchens Delivered
    3. 21 Days Delivery
  • 4. Lowest Price Guaranteed or We Match the Price.  
  • 5. Up to 10 Years Warranty.
  •  

We are the first Completely Managed Home Construction & Interior Designing service provider by experienced Construction Project Managers and Civil Engineers from renowned institutes like RICS & NICMAR. We are using cutting edge technologies to bridge all the gap to make your home construction journey smoother & memorable. We have implemented 100+ Quality Checks process to ensure Best-in-Class Construction Quality.

Our Promise To You by Top Architects in
  • Lucknow
  • Varanasi
  • Noida

HomeArchs has been a trusted label for many years now. We are one of the leading construction and design providers in the market.

We assure you that our services will be of top-notch quality. Our experienced team carefully looks into every minute detail before delivering the project to you. Additionally, we perform 100+ quality checks so that you can expect nothing less than the best in our services.

Since we are very customer-oriented, we offer up to a 10 years warranty of our services. So you can rest assured that we will be by your side if and whenever you need us.

Are You A Plot Owner ?
Now Move-In To Your Dream Home in Just (251 Days)?

Want to Know How?

Get Consultation Now
